definition.procedurexml: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="no"?><xml xmlns="https://developers.google.com/blockly/xml"><block deletable="false" type="event_trigger" x="40" y="40"><field name="trigger">no_ext_trigger</field><next><block type="controls_if"><value name="IF0"><block inline="false" type="logic_binary_ops"><field name="OP">AND</field><value name="A"><block type="compare_mcitems"><comment h="52" pinned="false" w="208">This tests if the entity is holding seeds in their main hand.</comment><value name="a"><block type="entity_iteminhand"><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"/></value></block></value><value name="b"><block type="mcitem_all"><field name="value">CUSTOM:HeartShapedHerbSeeds</field><comment h="50" pinned="false" w="154">Set this to be your seed item for your crop.</comment></block></value></block></value><value name="B"><block inline="false" type="logic_binary_ops"><field name="OP">AND</field><value name="A"><block type="compare_mcblocks"><comment h="52" pinned="false" w="201">This tests if the block the player right-clicked on is farmland.</comment><value name="a"><block type="world_data_blockat"><value name="x"><block type="coord_x"/></value><value name="y"><block type="coord_y"/></value><value name="z"><block type="coord_z"/></value></block></value><value name="b"><block type="mcitem_allblocks"><field name="value">Blocks.FARMLAND</field><comment h="34" pinned="false" w="196">Set this to be a farmland block.</comment></block></value></block></value><value name="B"><block type="compare_mcblocks"><comment h="68" pinned="false" w="183">This tests if the block above the block being clicked on is an air block.</comment><value name="a"><block type="world_data_blockat"><value name="x"><block type="coord_x"/></value><value name="y"><block type="math_dual_ops"><field name="OP">ADD</field><value name="A"><block type="coord_y"/></value><value name="B"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">1</field></block></value></block></value><value name="z"><block type="coord_z"/></value></block></value><value name="b"><block type="mcitem_allblocks"><field name="value">Blocks.AIR</field><comment h="33" pinned="false" w="168">Set this to be an air block.</comment></block></value></block></value></block></value></block></value><statement name="DO0"><block type="block_remove"><comment h="51" pinned="false" w="186">If the condition is true the block above will be removed.</comment><value name="x"><block type="coord_x"/></value><value name="y"><block type="math_dual_ops"><field name="OP">ADD</field><value name="A"><block type="coord_y"/></value><value name="B"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">1</field></block></value></block></value><value name="z"><block type="coord_z"/></value><next><block type="block_add"><comment h="52" pinned="false" w="237">If the condition is true the block above will be set to the first crop stage.</comment><value name="block"><block type="mcitem_allblocks"><field name="value">CUSTOM:HeartShapedHerbStage1</field><comment h="34" pinned="false" w="187">Set this to your crop stage 0.</comment></block></value><value name="x"><block type="coord_x"/></value><value name="y"><block type="math_dual_ops"><field name="OP">ADD</field><value name="A"><block type="coord_y"/></value><value name="B"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">1</field></block></value></block></value><value name="z"><block type="coord_z"/></value><next><block type="controls_if"><value name="IF0"><block type="logic_negate"><value name="BOOL"><block type="entity_iscreative"><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"/></value></block></value></block></value><statement name="DO0"><block type="entity_remove_item"><comment h="52" pinned="false" w="211">This removes one seed item that is in the player's main hand.</comment><value name="amount"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">1</field></block></value><value name="item"><block type="entity_iteminhand"><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"/></value></block></value><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"/></value></block></statement></block></next></block></next></block></statement></block></next></block></xml>
